text: @PMOIndia @narendramodi Educational Institutions are closed.Many ppl lost their jobs & are experiencing heavy cut in their income. It's difficult for poor & middle class students to pay fees for the #coronavirus period & so it must be waived off & be reduced for next semester as well #ReduceSemesterFee
